title: Patch 5.4 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Upate:

- DJ Sona skins release has been fixed and is now showing in the store correctly.

-ToxicHawk

It is the worst in teamfights/ganks (my fps dont drop, my ping may spike a bit, but not much). Any advice would be appreciated. this is exhausting me {{summoner:3}}

Firstly, Ping and FPS are unrelated. Ping is the time, in milliseconds, it takes for data to get to the server and back, FPS is the frames per second shown on your screen. Secondly, do you have VSync turned on? That often causes problems with FPS and may alleviate the issue if turned off. Thirdly, it may be a good idea to check your computer specs with the current minimum/recommended specs, [link here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements). Might not help but is still worth checking.
